synopsis.text: In the heart of an empire striving for progress, the imperial court invites extraterrestrial beings, assigning them roles based on their unique abilities to transform the outdated civilization. Amidst this, a local rebel, Zuo Yun Qi, infiltrates the court, masquerading as an alien to rescue his father. However, his cover is blown by a skilled Landlord, an expert in identifying foreigners. Their encounter leads to a series of humorous and intellectual clashes, ultimately resulting in an unlikely alliance. Together, they thwart a sinister plot, only to uncover a hidden alliance of aliens aiming to dethrone the current power and establish a utopian society. Reluctantly, Zuo Yun Qi and his allies are drawn into this escalating conflict, forced to take a stand.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
